name: M0TH3RB04RD
description:
M0TH3RB04RD is a game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Theme : Out of Control

Team : 

  • M. Guedj 
  • C. Pierrard
  • J. Ji Chen

The game follows a little robot sent inside a motherboard in order to fix it. However this piece of hardware is full of bugs and it makes it harder to control the little buddy !

In each level, the robot will lose some of its functionalities and you will have to find your way out.

Inputs :

  • W/S to move Forward and Backward.
  • A/D to rotate your character Left and Right.
  • Space to jump.
  • E to pick up boxes.
  • Mouse to rotate the camera.
  • Left Click to shoot.
  • O to reset the level.
